item.title: Quiche
item.description: Ingredients Ingredient Subheading 1 Deep dish pie crust 1/4 cup Sour cream 8 large Eggs 1/4 cup Cream Salt Pepper Cayenne Pepper Hearty Bits (Cook’s Choice) I tend to use whatever is left over in the kitchen Broccoli Peas Shredded Cheddar Onions Bacon Whatever tastes good Directions Prepare crust Pre-heat oven to 350F Take pie crust directly from freezer Gently poke holes in crust bottom without poking through pie tin or cracking crust Par-bake crust at 350F for 15 mins Prepare quiche Sautee any ingredients that require a little pre-cooking such as onions In a large bowl, mix eggs, sour cream, and cream together.

item.title: Chicken and Dumplings
item.description: Ingredients Soup 3 tablespoons unsalted butter 1/4 pound skinless, boneless chicken, cubed Breast or thighs is fine, your choice 1 yellow onion, diced 1/3 cup flour salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste 1 pinch cayenne pepper 6 cups chicken broth 2 celery, diced 1 large carrot, diced 1/2 teaspoon fresh thyme leaves (Optional) 2 tablespoons sliced green onions Dumplings 1/2 cup farmer’s cheese 1 1 large egg 1 1/4 teaspoons minced fresh rosemary 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, or to taste 1 pinch freshly ground black pepper 1/2 cup self-rising flour 1 pinch cayenne pepper Directions Soup Melt butter in a high saucepan with a lid over medium-high heat.

item.title: Coconut Chia Pudding
item.description: Ingredients Ingredient Subheading 1 can full-fat coconut milk 1 6 tablespoons chia seeds 1 tablespoon honey 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract Pinch of salt Directions Mix all ingredients together. Cover and let sit overnight in refrigerator. Eat it in the morning. Top with raspberry jam or any compote if desired. Granola is also a good addition. Footnotes Thai Kitchen does not have very good or rich flavor. Get another brand. ↩︎

item.title: 5 Minute Nacho Cheese Sauce
item.description: Ingredients 2 Tbsp butter 2 Tbsp flour 1 cup whole milk 6 oz. medium cheddar, shredded (about 1.5 cups) 1/4 tsp salt 1/4 tsp chili powder Directions Add the butter and flour to a small sauce pot. Heat and whisk the butter and flour together until they become bubbly and foamy. Continue to cook and whisk the bubbly mixture for about 60 seconds. Whisk the milk into the flour and butter mixture.

item.title: Bruschetta
item.description: Ingredients Tomatoes Garlic Onion Basil 1 Olive Oil Coarse Salt Directions Pile basil leaves on top of one another and roll into a log. Thinly slice basil into green confetti Dice tomatoes Loosely combine all ingredients without bruising them Footnotes Fresh from the garden makes all the difference ↩︎

item.title: Beef Brisket
item.description: Ingredients Dry Rub Dark Brown Sugar Salt Pepper Onion Powder Garlic Powder Paprika Rosemary Parsely Chili powder Cayenne pepper Cumin Directions Apply dry rub to brisket Let it sit in the fridge for several hours or overnight Cook in the smoker with hickory chips at 225F at about an hour a pound Elevate the brisket while it’s in the smoker to help smoke reach all sides of the meat. When the meat reaches 165 to 170 remove it and double wrap with aluminum foil to keep juices from leaking out Brisket is done when temp reaches 190F Let rest for 1 to 2 hours Temp will continue to rise to 200F while resting Footnotes

item.title: Apple Crisp
item.description: Ingredients 6 granny smith apples, peeled 1 tablespoon lemon juice 1/2 cup granulated sugar 1 1/4 cups + 2 tablespoons all purpose flour 1/2 cup old fashioned oats 1 cup brown sugar 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon 1/4 teaspoon salt 12 tablespoons (1 1/2 stick) butter, chilled and cut into small pieces Vanilla ice crea Directions Preheat oven to 350F In a large mixing bowl toss together the apples, lemon juice, 1/2 cup granulated sugar, 1/2 cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp flour Let mixture rest in refrigerator In a separate mixing bowl mix the remaining 1 1/4 cups flour, oats, 1/2 cup brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt Work the butter into the mixture until it comes together and large clumps form Move apple mixture to 2 quart (9x9) greased baking dish Sprinkle the topping over the fruit Bake until fruit is bubbling and the topping is crispy and golden brown (about 45 minutes) Serve with ice cream

item.title: Mystery Pecan Pie
item.description: Ingredients Crust 1 frozen pie crust Filling 1 package (8 oz) cream cheese, softened 1/3 cup sugar 1/4 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon vanilla 1 egg 3 eggs 1/4 cup sugar 1 cup corn syrup 1 teaspoon vanilla 1 1/4 cups chopped pecans Directions Place pie crust in 9-inch glass pie pan as directed on box for One-Crust Filled Pie. Heat oven to 375°F. In small bowl with electric mixer, beat cream cheese, 1/3 cup sugar, the salt, 1 teaspoon vanilla and 1 of the eggs on low speed until smooth and well blended; set aside.

item.title: Rice Pudding
item.description: Ingredients 1 cup arborio rice 12 4 cups whole milk 1 can (14 oz) of Eagle brand sweetened condensed milk 3 1 1/2 tsp vanilla extract 1/4 tsp salt Ground cinnamon Butter Raisins (optional) Condended Milk Alternative 1/2 cup sugar 1 egg 1/4 cup heavy cream 1/4 cup milk Directions In a double-boiler 4, bring rice, milk, condensed milk, and salt to a boil Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 1 hour Add vanilla and 1 tablespoon of butter Add raisins if desired Serve warm, top with butter and cinnamon Condended Milk Alternative Beat together sugar, egg, cream, and milk (or half and half) Stir mixture into rice Footnotes When cooking aroborio rice, minimize stirring as additional starch is realease when stirred.

item.title: Rice Pudding - Instant Pot
item.description: Ingredients 5 cups milk (full fat) (Or almond milk if vegan) 1 cup water 1 1/2 cup basmati rice (Or any medium grain white rice, rinsed) 1/2 cup sugar adjust to taste 2 tsp cinnamon Directions Add water to the pot 1 Press saute Once the water begins to steam or boil, pour the milk into the pot Add rice Stir, wait for mixture to begin steaming Close lid, pressure cook on high for 20 minutes Allow natural pressure release for 20 minutes Press saute Add sugar and cinnamon Stir until incorporated and thickened Turn off instant pot Extras Add raisins when adding sugar and cinnamon Top with whipped cream Mash the rice once cooked for a creamier texture Footnotes You must boil the water in the instant pot before adding the milk in order to avoid scorching ↩︎

item.title: Fluffy Pancakes
item.description: Ingredients Dry 3 c All purpose flour 1/4 c Sugar 1 1/2 tsp salt 1 tbsp baking powder 1 1/2 tsp baking soda Wet 2 1/4 c milk 1/4 c vegetable oil 1 tbsp vanilla extract 1/4 c apple cider vinegar 1 (optional) 1 egg, reduce milk by 1/4 cup if adding egg Whipped salted butter 1 stick of salted butter at room temperature 1 tbsp cold water Directions Pancakes Mix dry and wet in separate bowls.

item.title: Boiled Water
item.description: Ingredients Liquid Ingredients Water Directions Heat on High to 212F 1 Footnotes Water boils at 212F ↩︎
